reference_summary:
Segbeauty empty bottle 290 TruuMe {'Brand': 'Segbeauty', 'Color': 'Clear', 'Material Type Free': 'Dairy Free', 'Item Weight': '3.4 Ounces', 'Bottle Nipple Type': 'Vented', 'Package Dimensions': '7.99 x 3.19 x 2.24 inches; 3.4 Ounces', 'Item model number': 'AM-160083-03', 'UPC': '701822757553 701822760621'} This is definitely a mister, not a spray bottle! It produces such a fine mist, exactly as advertised. Such a fine mist! Fascy Facial Mask Beauty Treatment 5 Packs 3 Step Mask, Korean Facial Skincare Mask, All Natural Moisturizing Facial Mask Skin Beauty Treatment with Eye Cream, Skin Rejuvenation Facial Mask Fascy {'Brand': 'Fascy', 'Item Form': 'Cream, Sheet', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating', 'Scent': 'Centella Asiatica', 'Skin Type': 'Dry', 'Package Dimensions': '7.64 x 4.88 x 0.94 inches; 7.05 Ounces'} This is a great idea, but sadly not for me. After using all three steps my skin broke out into red bumps and remained red for 24 hours.
I don’t expect this is a common reaction and didn’t notice anything in the ingredients that I would react to, but there it is. Great idea, not for me. BABOR Power Serum Ampoules - Hyaluronic Acid | Moisturizing Smoothing and Plumping | 8D Hyaluronic Acid and Tripeptide Intensely Hydrate All Skin's Layers | 7 Days to Hydrated Skin {'Skin Type': 'All', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydration', 'Scent': 'Aloe', 'Brand': 'Babor', 'Item Form': 'Serum', 'Package Dimensions': '5.94 x 3.43 x 0.91 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:4eaf048eb55433860172118977ad0ff1]] I’ve used the entire box, exactly as directed and cannot recommend this product.

The only things I liked about this product is that it’s unscented and the packaging is kind of fun, but that is absolutely outweighed by the possibility cutting yourself.

It does not do what it says. It doesn’t provide “intensive plumping” or”improve skin elasticity” which are just ridiculous claims, particularly when you consider this used for one week and the first two ingredients are water and glycerine. I have pure glycerine and after mixing it with water in various percentages, I’d be comfortable betting that this product is at least 70% water.

I was able to cleanly snap all seven ampoules using the plastic topper provided. Even though my snaps were clean the edges of both pieces are sharp and you shouldn’t touch them. It took me several tries to figure out how to get all the serum out of the ampoules. For three days I was tapping the opening on my palm which didn’t feel great, but I just couldn’t get it to pour out cleanly.

Although it is almost as liquid as water, if you get the opening of the ampoules covered with the liquid it won’t come out because of surface tension. If this happens just turn the bottle open side up and blow on the liquid until the opening is clear and you’re good to go.

If you can tilt the bottle just right you can get the serum to pour out. It’s tricky, but spend the time doing it that way and you’ll save yourself a lot of frustration. You see me getting it right in the video, but even then I had to blow the ampoule open once.

There is also the cost. $50.00 for one week of use. That’s about $200 a month and $1250 a year although it does specify that you should use this daily for six weeks, maximum. Why? Is that concerning to anyone else? Anyway, even if you have money to burn you would do well spending it on a procedure from a dermatologist or a flight to Dubai for vacation. This is absolutely ridiculous. Not moisturizing. Moisturizing Heel Socks with Soft Gel Lining for Dry Cracked Feet Treatment - Unisex Reusable Foot Moisturizer SPA Socks for Women & Men - Pedicure Heel Sleeves from Breathable Cotton Pumice Valley {'Size': '1 Pair (Pack of 1)', 'Material': 'Gel', 'Brand': 'Pumice Valley', 'Fabric Type': 'Cotton', 'Package Dimensions': '7.87 x 4.02 x 0.91 inches; 2.08 Ounces', 'Manufacturer': 'PUMICE VALLEY'} My favorite thing about these is that they actually stay on all night!

I’ve worn silicone heel covers under really tight socks and I always wake up with them hanging around my ankles. These are tight, but they stay on even without socks.

My toes can breathe again! They stay on all night! 10pcs Nail Tips Clips for Quick Building Polygel Nail Forms Nail Tips Clip for Finger Nail Extension DIY Manicure Nail Art Tool tiggell {'Size': '10 Count (Pack of 1)', 'Brand': 'tiggell', 'Style': 'French', 'Coverage': 'Full Well Tips', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Package Dimensions': '7.64 x 5.24 x 1.61 inches; 2.08 Ounces'} These are definitely a bargain!

Fairly good product that I don’t actually need because the plastic forms for poly gel nails stay on my nails without them. I say fairly good because I could not get them to hold the forms on my pinkies. Definitely a bargain! MISS SPA Head to Toe Body and Facial Mask Set, Brighten Under-Eye, Deep Therapy Lip Mask, Moisturizing Foot Booties, Anti-Aging, Anti-Wrinkle, Skin Care for Women, 3-Pack MISS SPA {'Brand': 'MISS SPA', 'Product Benefits': 'Softening', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '3.07 x 0.24 x 4.33 inches; 2.15 Ounces', 'UPC': '838623303099'} I really enjoyed this set and it’s affordable enough that I can use it regularly,

I try to take a few hours one evening a week when everyone else has plans to take some time for myself. This has been really difficult during COVID quarantine so I ended up moving it all into the bathroom, lol! Bubble bath, a nice shampoo and deep conditioner, possibly a sheet mask, then I’m out of the bathroom...usually because someone needs to use it, lol!

I knew this set was going to be the perfect addition to my routine. The sheet masks never get right under my eyes or lips so the ones this kit supplies that target those areas are perfect! they supply are great! I’m still getting used to wearing the lip one because I’d never used one before, but there not uncomfortable and they do leave my lips feeling softer. I love that the foot ones aren’t exfoliating, just pure moisture. I put them on and cover them with socks, then inevitably fall asleep wearing them. The next morning I take them off, massage in the rest of the liquid, and they feel wonderful!

Not exactly a spa experience, but I’m not one who does that regularly anyway so this feels very indulgent! Effective and affordable addition to a spa day/night! WIS Hyaluronic Acid Facial Masks for Women Anti Aging, Moisturizing for All Skin Type 24 Pcs Sheet Mask, Daily Skin Care +WIS+ {'Brand': '+WIS+', 'Item Form': 'Mask', 'Product Benefits': 'Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Hyaluronic Acid', 'Skin Type': 'All', 'Package Dimensions': '6.18 x 5.04 x 4.13 inches; 1.83 Pounds'} I ordered this even after seeing that it is recommended for “young skin...to prevent wrinkles” and I am so glad I did! Old or young, this mask is for you!

It’s a nice, thin sheet and every package has more than enough serum in it. After placing the face mask (which fits me well) I use the extra serum on my neck, décolleté, and hands. I usually read or watch something on my tablet while I’m wearing it which means I have my glasses on. I am so pleased that they sit well on my nose and don’t interfere with the action of the mask in any way. It has never irritated my sensitive skin, and has proven soothing when my skin is having a reaction to something else.

These are also remarkably affordable (when I ordered them) for what you get which means I can use them regularly rather than save them for emergencies and special occasions!

10/10 Would recommend! 10/10 Would recommend! Foot Peel Mask Natural Exfoliating Peeling Treatment Skincare Footmask Dead Skin Remover Foot Scrub Feet Peeling Mask Repairs Dry Cracked Heels In Home Spa Exfoliation Care for Men or Women 55g Pack Footish by Saffron {'Is Discontinued By Manufacturer': 'No', 'Product Dimensions': '7.4 x 5.04 x 0.31 inches; 1.94 Ounces', 'UPC': '718910754868'} These foot masks work, but they are definitely in the expensive side. I won’t be ordering them again. Worked, but on the expensive side. O'JIVA Pure 24k Gold Collagen Eye Mask for Puffy Eyes and Dark Circles - Depuffing Eye Gel Patches - Natural Under Eye Bags Treatment for Women and Men - ​20 pairs (Gold 24k) O'JIVA {'Brand': "O'JIVA", 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Moisturizing', 'Scent': 'Fresh', 'Skin Type': 'Dry,All Skin Types', 'Package Dimensions': '4.65 x 3.66 x 1.81 inches; 8.57 Ounces', 'UPC': '723314856544'} These are individually packaged pairs of under eye masks that cost about $1.00 a pair at this time.

When you tear the packet open there is a little tray holding them in the liquid. There is definitely a right way to pull the tray from the bag and I did it wrong, which resulted in them sliding onto my hand instead of staying in place. Note to self! They slide around enough at first that you can easily place them, then adhere to your skin well enough that you can put on go about your business and even wear your glasses. They did leave my skin feeling softer for a while after using them, and that’s pretty much what I expect from these so I’m happy.

I have to say that thinking that they’re going to so something special for your skin because they’re gold colored is ridiculous. My skin did feel softer for a while after using them, and they are $1.00 a pair right now. ANGNYA Acrylic Nail Art Brush Kolinsky Sable Hair Brush For Acrylic Application With Black Marble Acrylic Handle Professional Manicure Pedicure for DIY Home Salon(size8) ANGNYA {'Brand': 'ANGNYA', 'Handle Material': 'Acrylic', 'Head Material': 'Kolinsky', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Shape': 'Oval', 'Package Dimensions': '8.46 x 3.82 x 0.55 inches; 0.63 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:b1af0a4132e86e40bd26b1a1ed9da1b0]] This is a very nice brush for acrylic nails and not bad for watercolors either!

I really like this brush. From the very start all I’ve seen is quality. There have been no loose bristles, it holds the amount of liquid I would expect from a brush this size, and will come to a point when wet. I am really surprised that it’s so inexpensive. I think the low cost will show in quality over time...I just don’t expect it to hold up as well as some of my more expensive brushes. I do take very good care of my brushes so we shall see! Very nice brush for acrylic nails and not bad for watercolors either! Hard Wax Beads,WAXNOW 2lb Wax Beans for Hair Removal, All-Purpose Use for Full Body, Golden Glitter Added, Hard Wax for Legs, Brazilian Bikini, Underarm, Face, Larger Refill for Wax Warmer Kit WAXNOW {'Item Form': 'Wax', 'Skin Type': 'Sensitive', 'Brand': 'WAXNOW', 'Number of Items': '1', 'Unit Count': '32 Ounce', 'Package Dimensions': '10.08 x 6.93 x 2.28 inches; 2.04 Pounds', 'UPC': '795890020053'} [[VIDEOID:262bf403b1c87b89ddb8468848820d4c]] I’m not experienced at this so I guess I didn’t know what to look for in a wax. My electric warmer came with hard wax so that’s what I ordered. This is prettier than the stuff that came with the unit, but works the same as far as I can tell. I’m getting better at this and think that has more to do with my success than the wax. The shimmer is nice. Maestee 9 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Kit, 6 Colors (8ml) with Base and Top Coat and Matte Top Gel (8ml) Neon Nail Polish Hot Neon City Collection Soak Off Nail Gel Polish Starter Professional Kit Best Mothers Day Gift maestee {'Brand': 'maestee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Number of Pieces': '9', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 3.66 x 1.42 inches; 14.07 Ounces'} I love everything about these bottles of polish!

Straight off, it’s nice to have bottles that aren’t black, they were thoughtful enough to put stickers of a very similar color with an identifying number on top of each and you get a base and top coat! With a consistency similar to a new bottle of luxury brand traditional polish they are a dream to apply. You get total coverage in two coats and they cure beautifully.

The colors are ridiculously bright and I have no idea what I’m going to use them for, but right now it just makes me smile to look at my swatches and that’s good enough for me! I just love them! Maestee 9 Pcs Gel Nail Polish Kit, 6 Colors (8ml) with Base and Top Coat and Matte Top Gel (8ml) Nail Polish Hot Modern Muse Collection Soak Off Nail Gel Polish Starter Professional Kit Best Mothers Day Gift maestee {'Brand': 'maestee', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Finish Type': 'Matte,Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Cruelty Free', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Fl Oz', 'Number of Items': '9', 'Number of Pieces': '9', 'Liquid Volume': '0.27 Fluid Ounces', 'Package Dimensions': '11.69 x 3.66 x 1.42 inches; 14.07 Ounces'} This is good polish that is easy to apply and has great colors. Unfortunately I have been unable to use it because Maestee won’t provide me with an ingredients list so I can’t use it. I’m allergic to a chemical commonly used in less expensive nail polish and can’t risk a reaction. They have some good polish with great colors. Unfortunately I can’t use it. NOHJ Secret Repair 3D-Ampoule Modeling Pack Of 4 Modeling Rubber Masks Moisturizing Facial Jelly Face Mask Set Collagen/Tea Tree/Vitamin C/Hyaluronic acid Peel Off Rubber Korean Skincare Face Mask NO:HJ {'Brand': 'NO:HJ', 'Item Form': 'Powder', 'Product Benefits': 'Hydrating,Skin Hydration', 'Scent': 'Tea Tree', 'Special Feature': 'Not Tested On Animals', 'Product Dimensions': '1.57 x 5.31 x 6.5 inches; 11.32 Ounces'} [[VIDEOID:e86d1c07078a7c725dfea6e4749c9ef3]] These masks are fun and messy and I love them!

You get a small packet of powder and a large packet of gel for each mask. It would be easy to split them in half before mixing and get eight masks out of this instead of four. You could also apply it to your face and neck and still have enough!

I stirred it thoroughly with the wooden spreader included, and it got more and more gummy as I stirred. I chose to apply it with a silicone spatula tool I have for the purpose and it was…messy! If you put it on too early or too thickly all in one go, it drips down your face and looks like your skin is melting (according to my spouse.) You can apply it in thinner layers, but you don’t want to go too slowly either because it’ll turn gummy and unspreadable. I found this to be entertaining rather than problematic. I accidentally got it on my lips so I just went with it and sealed my mouth shut. Blessed silence for half an hour!

After peeling it off (which was also totally fun and kind of gross) my skin felt softer than before I used it and I’d thoroughly enjoyed 45 minutes of my life. YES! I’m a believer!

Next time I’ll use half a mask at a time, but this was a great experience!! They’re fun and messy and I love them! BQAN 2 Pieces Wax Pencil for Rhinestones, Dual-ended Rhinestone Picker Dotting Tool, Wax Pen for DIY Nail Art, Rhinestone Gems Crystals Studs Picker With Pink Acrylic Handle (Pink & Pink) BQAN {'Package Dimensions': '7.6 x 3.54 x 1.46 inches; 2.89 Ounces', 'UPC': '710050098918'} Great little tools that really work! One star off for smushed tips and cracked packaging. Great little tools that really work! Morovan Monomer Acrylic Nail Liquid 8 Oz/240 ML-Professional Nail Flowers Liquid Monomer for acrylic nails Morovan {'Product Dimensions': '2.76 x 3.15 x 7.09 inches; 1.03 Pounds'} UPDATE!

I’m so positive this mon9mer contains MMA which has been banned on the US because it it so toxic. I came to this conclusion when I tried to remove the nails. Non MMA monomer nails come off easily after soaking in acetone. You need to file the surface, then soak them for 10-20 minutes. You then scrape it off and it comes off in flakes and bits and pieces. You may need to do this more than once. With MMA, you use the same process, but once you start scraping it is a sticky, messy process and as soon as the nail is out of the acetone, it immediately starts to solidify so you really have to do it over and over again, or do the scraping while the nails are in the acetone.

This monomer works well, doesn’t cause my white to yellow at all, but it reeks! Just opening the box I was overwhelmed by the smell. It only got worse once I opened it. After using it for a while I went nose blind, which happens with all sorts of smells, but when my husband got home from work he told me to go outside to use it, lol! UPDATE! Contains MMA. HOMOST Starry Magnetic Cat Eye Gel Nail Polish Set, 6PCS Galactic Auroras Chameleon Gel Nail Polish Kit With Magnet Homost {'Brand': 'Homost', 'Item Form': 'Gel', 'Color': 'Black', 'Type': 'gel', 'Finish Type': 'Glossy', 'Material Feature': 'Non-Toxic, Natural', 'Age Range (Description)': 'Adult', 'Number of Items': '6', 'Package Dimensions': '7.48 x 3.23 x 1.18 inches; 6.7 Ounces'} I would give this five stars if there were an ingredient list. The colors are beautiful, they apply easily, cure well, and hold up as well as any gel polish I’ve used. Would give five stars if there was an ingredient list! Professional Nail Drill Machine, Gugusure Anti-Drop 35000 RPM Rechargeable Nail Drill Machine for Acrylic Nails, Gel, Manicure, Portable Electric Cordless Efile Nail Drill Kit for Salon and Home DIY Gugusure {'Brand': 'Gugusure', 'Material': 'Aluminum', 'Power Source': 'Battery Powered', 'Maximum Rotational Speed': '35000 RPM', 'Package Dimensions': '8.15 x 6.5 x 2.24 inches; 1.46 Pounds', 'Manufacturer': 'gugusure company'} My favorite e-file!

It’s not the most expensive one I own, but the battery life and ease of use have made it my favorite. My favorite e-file! Milo's Self-Cleaning Slicker Brush for Grooming Dogs and Cats, Gently Removes Loose Hair Undercoat, Great Detangling & Massaging Tool for Your Pets Milo's Pet ["Milo's Self Cleaning Slicker Brush for Dogs and Cats Grooming, This Pet Brush Gently Removes Loose Hair Undercoat, Great Detangling and Massaging Tool for Your Pets''"] {'Brand': "Milo's Pet Store", 'Handle Material': 'Metal', 'Unit Count': '1.00 Count', 'Material': 'Metal', 'Package Dimensions': '9.25 x 5.43 x 2.28 inches; 5.61 Ounces', 'Item model number': '1'} I ordered this to help me mix colors with the wool roving I use for needle felting and it works perfectly! Win! Brilliant for blending wool roving!
profile:
**User Summary:**

- **Product Preference:** The user prioritizes effective functionality and cost-effectiveness, seeking innovative products that enhance creativity while delivering exceptional performance. Their recent purchase demonstrates a strong preference for tools that serve multiple purposes.

- **Quality Awareness:** Their discerning nature regarding safety and efficacy is highlighted by a critical approach to product formulations, with a focus on transparency and performance. Their latest interaction reinforces this commitment to understanding product attributes and effectiveness.

- **Brand Loyalty:** While maintaining cautious loyalty to established brands, the user remains open to exploring new options that offer impressive results at reasonable costs. Their scrutiny of product components, particularly concerning safety standards, continues to influence their decisions.

- **Material Consideration:** The preference for safe, non-toxic materials persists, reflecting their ongoing concern over harmful ingredients. This vigilance shapes their decision-making process, evident in their recent reviews.

- **Performance Over Aesthetics:** Functionality is the primary focus, with the user open to unconventional products that provide practical and engaging experiences. Their latest interaction underscores this preference for multi-functional tools.

- **Critical but Balanced Reviews:** The user provides reflective and constructive feedback, emphasizing effective usage and safety. Their confidence in advocating for quality products is growing, as they balance enjoyment with practicality while reinforcing their commitment to safety and product quality in their selections.
